details.command: python3 train.py --arch resnet20s --dataset CIFAR10 --k ${k} --exp-mode prune --exp-name resnet20s_ratio${k}_std_auto --trainer base --val-method base --source-net results/pretrained/resnet20s_pretrain.pth.tar --scaled-score-init --result-dir results --use_trainable_router --router_checkpoint_path results/pretrained/resnet20s_adv_pretrain.pth.tar --router_arch resnet20s
